item.title: Project 0 Project Manager Part 1
item.description: Welcome to the first project of my blog. Before I start making any major projects, I would like to create a project manager application that will help me keep track of all of my projects. Here is an image of what I want my final application to look like: The programming language that I am most familiar with at the time of making this project is C++, so that is what I am going to be using for this project.
